TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Color extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示一种 ARGB 颜色（alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色）。

span.span: Represents an ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由使用的属性表示的指定的颜色结构。Named colors are represented by using the properties of the structure. 有关这些颜色的详细信息，请参阅[按名称的颜色](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92332)。For more information about these colors, see [Colors by Name](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92332). 每个像素的颜色表示为一个 32 位数字： 8 位每次都 alpha、 红色、 绿色和蓝色 (ARGB)。The color of each pixel is represented as a 32-bit number: 8 bits each for alpha, red, green, and blue (ARGB). 每个四个组件是一个介于 0 到 255，其中 0 表示没有亮度，255 表示完整的强度。Each of the four components is a number from 0 through 255, with 0 representing no intensity and 255 representing full intensity. Alpha 分量指定颜色的透明度： 0 表示完全透明，255 是完全不透明。The alpha component specifies the transparency of the color: 0 is fully transparent, and 255 is fully opaque. 若要确定 alpha、 红色、 绿色还是蓝色组件的一种颜色，请使用， ， ，或属性，分别。To determine the alpha, red, green, or blue component of a color, use the , , , or property, respectively. 你可以通过使用之一创建自定义颜色方法。You can create a custom color by using one of the methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示， ， ，和属性，和成员。The following code example demonstrates the , , , and properties of a , and the member. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue`方法从窗体的事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into the form and call the `ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue` method from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PointsAndSizes/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取此 结构的 alpha 组件值。

span.span: Gets the alpha component value of this structure.

value.span: 此 的 alpha 分量值。

span.span: The alpha component value of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个像素的颜色表示为一个 32 位数字： 8 位每次都 alpha、 红色、 绿色和蓝色 (ARGB)。The color of each pixel is represented as a 32-bit number: 8 bits each for alpha, red, green, and blue (ARGB). Alpha 分量指定颜色的透明度： 0 表示完全透明，255 是完全不透明。The alpha component specifies the transparency of the color: 0 is fully transparent, and 255 is fully opaque. 同样，值为 255 表示一个不透明的颜色。Likewise, an value of 255 represents an opaque color. 1 到 254 之间的值表示半透明的颜色。An value from 1 through 254 represents a semitransparent color. 颜色将变为更加作为不透明接近 255。The color becomes more opaque as approaches 255. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示， ， ，和属性，和成员。The following code example demonstrates the , , , and properties of a , and the member. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue`方法从窗体的事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into the form and call the `ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue` method from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此结构只做与其他比较结构。This structure only does comparisons with other structures. 若要比较基于其 ARGB 值的颜色，应使用方法。To compare colors based solely on their ARGB values, you should use the method. 这是因为和成员会确定等效性时使用多个只是 ARGB 价值的颜色。This is because the and members determine equivalency using more than just the ARGB value of the colors. 例如，和`FromArgb(0,0,0)`不会视为相等的因为是已命名的颜色和`FromArgb(0,0,0)`不是。For example, and `FromArgb(0,0,0)` are not considered equal, since is a named color and `FromArgb(0,0,0)` is not.

public: static System::Drawing::Color FromArgb(int argb);

param.name: argb
param.span: 用于指定 32 位 ARGB 值的值。

span.span: A value specifying the 32-bit ARGB value.

summary.span: 基于一个 32 位 ARGB 值创建 结构。

span.span: Creates a structure from a 32-bit ARGB value.

returns.span: 此方法创建的 结构。

span.span: The structure that this method creates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字节顺序的 32 位 ARGB 值是 AARRGGBB。The byte-ordering of the 32-bit ARGB value is AARRGGBB. 由 AA、 表示最高有效字节 (MSB) 是 alpha 分量值。The most significant byte (MSB), represented by AA, is the alpha component value. 第二个、 第三个和第四个字节，分别表示 RR、 GG 和 BB，分别是组件红色、 绿色和蓝色。The second, third, and fourth bytes, represented by RR, GG, and BB, respectively, are the color components red, green, and blue, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建三个画笔，每个不同的颜色。Creates three brushes, each a different color. 每个从 32 位 ARGB 值创建用于创建画笔的结构。Each structure that is used to create a brush is created from a 32-bit ARGB value. - 使用虚构的三角形定位三个圆圈。Uses an imaginary triangle to position three circles. - 绘制三个重叠圆圈，每个在三角形，用于每个圆圈不同画笔的一个顶点上居中。Paints three overlapping circles, each centered on one vertex of the triangle, using a different brush for each circle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Drawing.Color FromArgb (int alpha, System.Drawing.Color baseColor);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Drawing.Color FromArgb(int32 alpha, valuetype System.Drawing.Color baseColor) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromArgb (alpha As Integer, baseColor As Color) As Color
public: static System::Drawing::Color FromArgb(int alpha, System::Drawing::Color baseColor);

span.span: The alpha value for the new .
Valid values are 0 through 255.
The from which to create the new .

summary.span: 从指定的 结构创建 结构，但要使用新指定的 alpha 值。

span.span: Creates a structure from the specified structure, but with the new specified alpha value.

summary.span: 尽管此方法允许为 alpha 值传递 32 位值，但该值仅限于 8 位。

span.span: Although this method allows a 32-bit value to be passed for the alpha value, the value is limited to 8 bits.
The that this method creates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建一个不透明的颜色，设置`alpha`到 255 之间。To create an opaque color, set `alpha` to 255. 若要创建半透明的颜色，请设置`alpha`为从 1 到 254 的任何值。To create a semitransparent color, set `alpha` to any value from 1 through 254. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: 1. 创建从三个颜色组件值 （红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 的结构。Creates structures from the three color component values (red, green, blue). 三个结构创建的一个用于每个主要颜色。Three structures are created, one for each primary color. 2. 循环访问一系列的 alpha 值，更改一种颜色的 alpha 值。Iterates through a range of alpha values, changing the alpha value of a color. 3. 每次迭代过程中设置的画笔的颜色，到修改后的颜色，并绘制一个矩形，以显示该颜色。During each iteration, sets the color of a brush to the modified color and paints a rectangle to show the color. 4. 针对每个主要颜色重复步骤 2 和 3。Repeats steps 2 and 3 for each primary color. Alpha 值永远不会是完全不透明和矩形会重叠以便获得颜色组合效果。The alpha value is never fully opaque and the rectangles overlap so you get color-combination effects. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than 255.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: 1. 创建从三个颜色组件值 （红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 的结构。Creates structures from the three color component values (red, green, blue). 三个结构创建的一个用于每个主要颜色。Three structures are created, one for each primary color. 2. 循环访问一系列的 alpha 值，更改一种颜色的 alpha 值。Iterates through a range of alpha values, changing the alpha value of a color. 3. 每次迭代过程中设置的画笔的颜色，到修改后的颜色，并绘制一个矩形，以显示该颜色。During each iteration, sets the color of a brush to the modified color and paints a rectangle to show the color. 4. 针对每个主要颜色重复步骤 2 和 3。Repeats steps 2 and 3 for each primary color. Alpha 值永远不会是完全不透明和矩形会重叠以便获得颜色组合效果。The alpha value is never fully opaque and the rectangles overlap so you get color-combination effects. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建一个不透明的颜色，设置`alpha`到 255 之间。To create an opaque color, set `alpha` to 255. 若要创建半透明的颜色，请设置`alpha`为从 1 到 254 的任何值。To create a semitransparent color, set `alpha` to any value from 1 through 254. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建三个画笔，每个不同的颜色。Creates three brushes, each a different color. 每个从 alpha、 红色、 绿色 （蓝色） 的四个组件值创建用于创建画笔的结构。Each structure that is used to create a brush is created from four component values (alpha, red, green, blue). - 使用虚构的三角形定位三个圆圈。Uses an imaginary triangle to position three circles. - 绘制三个重叠圆圈，每个在三角形，用于每个圆圈不同画笔的一个顶点上居中。Paints three overlapping circles, each centered on one vertex of the triangle, using a different brush for each circle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 预定义的颜色也被称为已知的颜色和表示的元素枚举。A predefined color is also called a known color and is represented by an element of the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建的实例结构， `redShade`、 要用于比较。Creates an instance of a structure, `redShade`, to be used for comparisons. - 循环访问枚举元素以查找具有为相同的亮度的所有已知的颜色`redShade`。Iterates through the enumeration elements to find all known colors that have the same lightness as `redShade`. 时找到 15 个匹配项或循环计数器的值大于最后一个来终止迭代元素。The iterations are terminated when 15 matches are found or the value of the loop counter is greater than the last element. - 每次迭代中，过程将保存元素-如果它符合条件-在一个数组中。During each iteration, saves the element—if it matches the criteria—in an array. - 使用画笔来绘制矩形。Uses a brush to paint rectangles. 第一个矩形绘制所表示的颜色`redShade`。The first rectangle is painted the color represented by `redShade`. 每个其他矩形绘制相匹配的亮度`redShade`。Each of the other rectangles is painted a that matches the lightness of the `redShade`. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个像素的颜色表示为一个 32 位数字： 8 位每次都 alpha、 红色、 绿色和蓝色 (ARGB)。The color of each pixel is represented as a 32-bit number: 8 bits each for alpha, red, green, and blue (ARGB). 每个四个组件是一个介于 0 到 255，其中 0 表示没有亮度，255 表示完整的强度。Each of the four components is a number from 0 through 255, with 0 representing no intensity and 255 representing full intensity. 同样，是从 0 到 255 其中 0 表示没有绿色到 255 个表示完全绿色的值。Likewise, is a value from 0 to 255 with 0 representing no green and 255 representing fully green. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示， ， ，和属性，和成员。The following code example demonstrates the , , , and properties of a , and the member. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue`方法从窗体的事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into the form and call the `ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue` method from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个像素的颜色表示为一个 32 位数字： 8 位每次都 alpha、 红色、 绿色和蓝色 (ARGB)。The color of each pixel is represented as a 32-bit number: 8 bits each for alpha, red, green, and blue (ARGB). 每个四个组件是一个介于 0 到 255，其中 0 表示没有亮度，255 表示完整的强度。Each of the four components is a number from 0 through 255, with 0 representing no intensity and 255 representing full intensity. 同样，Likewise, 是一个介于 0 到 255 之间，其中 0 表示没有红色，255 表示完全红色。 is a value from 0 to 255 with 0 representing no red and 255 representing fully red. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示， ， ，和属性，和成员。The following code example demonstrates the , , , and properties of a , and the member. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue`方法从窗体的事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into the form and call the `ShowPropertiesOfSlateBlue` method from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . summary.span: 获取此 结构的 32 位 ARGB 值。

span.span: Gets the 32-bit ARGB value of this structure.

returns.span: 此 的 32 位 ARGB 值。

span.span: The 32-bit ARGB value of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字节顺序的 32 位 ARGB 值是 AARRGGBB。The byte-ordering of the 32-bit ARGB value is AARRGGBB. 由 AA、 表示最高有效字节 (MSB) 是 alpha 分量值。The most significant byte (MSB), represented by AA, is the alpha component value. 第二个、 第三个和第四个字节，分别表示 RR、 GG 和 BB，分别是组件红色、 绿色和蓝色，The second, third, and fourth bytes, represented by RR, GG, and BB, respectively, are the color components red, green, and blue, respectively ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 循环访问枚举元素以查找所有已知的颜色，都有非零值的绿色组件和零值的红色组件，并且不是系统颜色。Iterates through the enumeration elements to find all known colors that have a non-zero green component and a zero-value red component, and that are not system colors. - 每次迭代中，过程将保存元素-如果它符合条件-在一个数组中。During each iteration, saves the element—if it matches the criteria—in an array. - 使用画笔来绘制矩形。Uses a brush to paint rectangles. 每个矩形绘制匹配第一个项目符号中所述的条件。Each of the rectangles is painted a that matches the criteria stated in the first bullet. 名称并显示其组件值。The name of the and its component values are also displayed. 此示例显示某些已知的颜色、 颜色和它们四个分量的值的名称。This example displays certain known colors, the names of the colors, and their four component values. 方法使用作为预备步骤，以显示组件值。The method is used as a preliminary step to display the component values. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorExamples/VB/form1.vb#9)]

summary.span: 获取此 结构的 值。

returns.span: 如果 是使用 方法或 方法基于预定义颜色创建的，则为 枚举的一个元素；否则为 0。

span.span: An element of the enumeration, if the is created from a predefined color by using either the method or the method; otherwise, 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 预定义的颜色也被称为已知的颜色和表示的元素枚举。A predefined color is also called a known color and is represented by an element of the enumeration. 当方法应用于结构，它通过创建方法，返回 0，即使 argb 值与预定义的颜色 ARGB 值匹配。When the method is applied to a structure that is created by using the method, returns 0, even if the ARGB value matches the ARGB value of a predefined color. 也会应用到时返回 0结构，它通过创建与字符串名称不是有效的方法。 also returns 0 when it is applied to a structure that is created by using the method with a string name that is not valid.

summary.span: 将此 结构转换为用户可读的字符串。

span.span: Converts this structure to a human-readable string.

returns.span: 如果 是使用 方法或 方法基于预定义颜色创建的，则是作为此 的名称的字符串；否则是由 ARGB 组件名称及其值组成的字符串。

span.span: A string that is the name of this , if the is created from a predefined color by using either the method or the method; otherwise, a string that consists of the ARGB component names and their values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 预定义的颜色也被称为已知的颜色和表示的元素枚举。A predefined color is also called a known color and is represented by an element of the enumeration. 当方法应用于结构，它通过创建方法，返回 ARGB 组件名称和它们的值，组成的字符串，即使 ARGB 值匹配的 ARGB 值预定义的颜色。When the method is applied to a structure that is created by using the method, returns a string that consists of the ARGB component names and their values, even if the ARGB value matches the ARGB value of a predefined color. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 循环访问枚举元素以查找所有已知的颜色，都有非零值的绿色组件和零值红色组件并且不是系统颜色。Iterates through the enumeration elements to find all known colors that have a non-zero green component and a zero-value red component and that are not system colors. - 每次迭代中，过程将保存元素-如果它符合条件-在一个数组中。During each iteration, saves the element—if it matches the criteria—in an array. - 使用画笔来绘制矩形。Uses a brush to paint rectangles. 每个矩形绘制匹配第一步中所述的条件。Each of the rectangles is painted a that matches the criteria stated in the first step. 名称并显示其组件值。The name of the and its component values are also displayed. 此示例显示某些已知的颜色，并使用若要显示的颜色和它们四个分量的值的名称。This example displays certain known colors and uses to display the names of the colors and their four component values.
